channel.title: Need Defender Block Emote (508)
channel.description: Can someone PLEASE give me the emote for defender blocking? I've been searching emotes for like 2 weeks and I just cant find it.

item.title: Need Defender Block Emote (508)
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:4, topic:236895”]“It is no secret that there are many members on this forum that are posting in old topics. This is not against the rules. But, in most cases, these users are spamming the topic just to bump it, and that is against the rules. Anyone who does not legitimately gravedig a topic will henceforth be warned or moderated immediately. This is a harsh decision, but it is necessary to stop this gravedigging epidemic that is spreading the forum.”

He gravedug legitimately.[/quote]

hehe I just saw that some people were having problems and asking me over msn so now they can look here.

Read full topic
